The serial was six gruesome tales inspired by Mary Shelly&#039;s Frankenstein, and was a 
group of stories Lovecraft considered to be his Ã‚Â«poorest work... stuff done to order for a vulgar magazine, and written down to the herd&#039;s level.
Contrary to Lovecraft&#039;s opinion of his own work, Re-animator is a very enjoyable
